description: Glamming up for the occasion, the 32-year-old slipped her toned figure into a tight-fitting black number with a thigh-high split.
title: Holly Candy joins her husband Nick at G'Day USA gala in Los Angeles
title_page: Holly Candy joins her husband Nick at G'Day USA gala in Los Angeles | Daily Mail Online
text:
It's been 14 years since she said goodbye to Ramsay Street but Holly Candy, nee Valance, hasn't forgotten her Australian roots.
The former Neighbours star and her property developer husband Nick joined a host of Antipodean talent at the G'Day USA gala in Los Angeles on Thursday evening.
Glamming up for the occasion, the 32-year-old slipped her toned figure into a tight-fitting black number with a thigh-high split.
Scroll down for video
Racy: Holly Candy flashed a glimpse of her toned and tanned legs in a racy slit frock as she joined her husband Nick the G'Day USA gala in Los Angeles on Thursday
Holly's figure hugging frock featured a slight racer-front neckline that flashed plenty of skin around her shoulders before falling to the ground in a floor-sweeping hem.
A lace-up detail down the side opened into a slit from which one of the actress' bronzed pins could be seen.
She added sparkle to the otherwise rather simple dress with plenty of bling in the form of a heavy diamond bracelet.
Her strappy stilettos were also lined with jewels and she wore glittering stud earrings to match.
Bronzed beauty: The former Neighbours star flaunted her svelte physique in her tight-fitting frock
Blinged up: The 32-year-old added sparkle to the otherwise rather simple dress with plenty of bling in the form of a heavy diamond bracelet
Mother-of-one Holly's long blonde locks were left loose in a naturally sleek and straight style and she kept her makeup natural with plenty of bronzer and a glossy nude lip.
Meanwhile Nick was looking dapper by her side in a black tuxedo and a bow tie.
Also in attendance for the glitzy evening event were newly engaged couple Mariah Carey and James Packer.
The Voice Australia coach Joel Madden was also there with his wife Nicole Richie, as were the boys from Five Seconds Of Summer and Foreign Minister Julie Bishop.
